table.name: Airborne Encounters
table.caption: Airborne Encounters
rows: A gleaming {@book Lyrandar Air Cruiser|EFA|7|Lyrandar Air Cruiser Summary} helmed by a Friendly but pompous {@creature Noble Prodigy|XMM} or {@creature Lyrandar Scion|EFA}
A {@book Strider Airship|EFA|7|Strider Airship Summary} with a Hostile crew of {@dice 2d4} {@creature Pirate|XMM|Pirates} and one {@creature Pirate Captain|XMM}
{@dice 2d6} {@book Lyrandar Skyskiffs|EFA|7|Lyrandar Skyskiff Summary} gathered for a race; the ships' pilots are Indifferent but disgruntled toward anyone who interrupts their activities
A derelict Lyrandar Air Cruiser, stranded in the sky after its engine's elemental core shattered
{@dice 1d4} {@creature Air Elemental|XMM|Air Elementals} making cloud sculptures
Two {@creature Sphinx of Secrets|XMM|Sphinxes of Secrets}, trying to figure out how the airship flies
A flock of {@dice 2d4} {@creature Peryton|XMM|Perytons} hiding in a cloud, waiting to ambush unsuspecting travelers
One {@creature Roc|XMM} looking for food to carry to its nest
